ygData.subject: Re: Split personality
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry I have been outta town and havent really had time to post...and of course I lost all the things I wanted, like Trinity, and Darkmouse. Hell Beast cursed.

Sorry I have been outta town and havent really had time to post...and of 
course I lost all the things I wanted, like Trinity, and Darkmouse.

    Hell Beast cursed. The kitten was gone.....just like that. His mission 
was a joke, how was he supposed to do this, with one person. The senate 
member who sent him here did it to get rid of him. This was a punishment, not 
a privilage.
    "Gremlin.....we have left Black Aracnia. She is a fool. Now, we are going 
to find Megatron and help him. The Predacon Council will pay for sending me 
here.....everyone will pay!" He said with bitter hatred in his old gruff 
voice.
    "Where are we going to find Megatron?" Gremlin said, a loyal yes-man who 
would follow his leader into the Inferno. "And what makes you think he wont 
kill us?"
    The only place he could be would be in Ominous Primes lair. There are no 
toher bases, old or new, he could be in. And Megatron isnt an outdoor bot, he 
cant rough it. He needs a luxury suite. Now, lets go."
    And with that, Hell BEast and Gremlin set out towrds the great north 
artic region.

    Aaracnia shighed. She wanted to join the Predacons together but it wasnt 
working out. It was to much for one bot to do....it was time to get friends. 
She was going to call Kitkat. If she would let her group join, they could 
make one big Predacon group, and then others would join, and if they didnt 
join they would be conqured and forced to join.
    "Paralysis, get Kitkat on the comm, I want to talk to her." She said, and 
then turned to see Quickstrike and Cyber Claw enter the bridge. "And what do 
we owe the pleasure of this visit?"

    Paralysis called Kitkat, or her base at least. "This is Paralysis, of the 
Predacons under Black Aracnia. She wishes to speak to you, its very 
important."
